DeleteHpoExperiment.title: DeleteHpoExperiment
DeleteHpoExperiment.summary: Deletes a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment. After you delete the experiment, you cannot obtain the data about the experiment and its trials by using the Get or List API operations.

GetHpoExperiment.title: GetHpoExperiment
GetHpoExperiment.summary: Queries the information about a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment, including the status and configuration of the experiment, and the status of its trials.

GetHpoTrial.title: GetHpoTrial
GetHpoTrial.summary: Queries information about a trial in a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment.

GetServiceIdentityRole.title: GetServiceIdentityRole
GetServiceIdentityRole.summary: GetServiceIdentityRole, return role name if SLR exists, empty otherwise

ListHpoExperimentLogs.title: ListHpoExperimentLogs
ListHpoExperimentLogs.summary: Queries the content of a log file for a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment.

ListHpoExperiments.title: ListHpoExperiments
ListHpoExperiments.summary: Queries information about a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment that meets specific requirements.

ListHpoTrialCommands.title: ListHpoTrialCommands
ListHpoTrialCommands.summary: Queries the command output of a trial in a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment. A trial of an HPO experiment runs one or more commands in sequence based on the command set specified in the configuration. You can call this API operation to obtain the output of these commands.

ListHpoTrialLogNames.title: ListHpoTrialLogNames
ListHpoTrialLogNames.summary: Lists the names of all log files of the specific trial in a specific hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment.

ListHpoTrialLogs.title: ListHpoTrialLogs
ListHpoTrialLogs.summary: Lists the content of a specific log file of a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) trial by pages.

ListHpoTrials.title: ListHpoTrials
ListHpoTrials.summary: Returns all the trials for the specified experiment ID.

RestartHpoTrials.title: RestartHpoTrials
RestartHpoTrials.summary: Restarts failed trials in an hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment. The system extracts the configuration of the hyperparameters of a specific trial. If none of the trials that use this configuration are successful in the experiment, the system restarts trials by using this configuration.

StopHpoExperiment.title: StopHpoExperiment
StopHpoExperiment.summary: Stops a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment, including its trials and the backend tasks.

StopHpoTrials.title: StopHpoTrials
StopHpoTrials.summary: Stops specific trials in a hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment and the backend tasks of the trials.

UpdateHpoExperiment.title: UpdateHpoExperiment
UpdateHpoExperiment.summary: Updates the configurations of a running hyperparameter optimization (HPO) experiment. After you update the experiment, the experiment continues to run based on the new configurations.
